snippet.title: Martha is Dead - Official Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
In Martha is Dead, conflict intensifies between German and Allied forces when the body of a woman is found drowned. Her twin sister must deal with the trauma of loss, while the truth of the brutal murder is shrouded by mysterious folklore and the extreme horror of war.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
